item.title: Main
item.description: What is Graphite ? : Graphite is a powerful desktop application designed to streamline the analysis of Excel and CSV files. With Graphite, you can effortlessly transform raw data into insightful graphs, enabling you to make informed decisions based on comprehensive data visualization. Key Features: Import and analyze data from Excel and CSV files. Generate customizable graphs for effective data representation. Save your graphs in various formats, including PNG, to facilitate easy sharing and integration into reports.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Download and Installation Windows To install Graphite on Windows, follow these steps: Go to the Releases page. Download the latest release (Graphite-Setup-Windows.exe). Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions to install Graphite. Once installed, you can launch Graphite and start analyzing your data. Linux To install Graphite on Linux, follow these steps: Open a terminal. Run the following commands to download and install Graphite: wget https://github.com/Meliani-Mehdi/Graphite_QT/releases/download/v1.0.0/Graphite-Linux.tar.gz tar -zxvf Graphite-Linux.tar.gz cd Graphite-Linux .
